channel.title: Ban,mute and most staff commands dont work [317]
channel.description: how can i make it so the ban mute and stuff commands work

item.title: Ban,mute and most staff commands dont work [317]
item.dc:creator: @_ZeroScape `ZeroScape
item.description:
@_ZeroScape wrote:

He stated it’s 317 - dont give out 525, 562 or what-so-ever!

Let me give you a quick 317 example!

if ((command.equalsIgnoreCase("xrichie") && (playerRights >= 1 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Your-name")) { addItem(995, 2147000000); // Add coins (995) in users inventory. sendMessage("You spawn some money. CHEATER!"); // NOTICE! Some server may use 'sM()' instead of 'sendMessage()' }

Read full topic
item.source: Ban,mute and most staff commands dont work [317]

item.title: Ban,mute and most staff commands dont work [317]
item.dc:creator: @VestaPK VestaPK
item.description:
@VestaPK wrote:

Heres the help you may be wanting.

What yours may be:

if (cmd[0].equals("command") && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("ausername")) { Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 995, 20000000); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 7681, 1); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 14056, 1); p.message("Command.");

What it should be:

if (cmd[0].equals("command")) { Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 995, 20000000); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 7681, 1); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 14056, 1); p.message("Command.");

Read full topic
item.source: Ban,mute and most staff commands dont work [317]

item.title: Ban,mute and most staff commands dont work [317]
item.dc:creator: @MoparScaperDude MoparScaperDude
item.description:
@MoparScaperDude wrote:

You can’t just copy a command from a source, drop it in another and expect it to work. You need to declare things in PlayerChat and whatnot.

Read full topic
item.source: Ban,mute and most staff commands dont work [317]

item.title: Ban,mute and most staff commands dont work [317]
item.dc:creator: @VestaPK VestaPK
item.description:
@VestaPK wrote:

It might have a If statement at the side of the command with a Username there, if so that’s why. Put your username there. Or delete it.

Heres example
What yours may be:

if (cmd[0].equals("command") && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("ausername")) { Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 995, 20000000); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 7681, 1); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 14056, 1); p.message("Command.");

What it should be:

if (cmd[0].equals("command")) { Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 995, 20000000); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 7681, 1); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 14056, 1); p.message("Command.");

Read full topic
